alert.note: Alert for Western Skagit County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 22 at 4:24AM PST until December 23 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of up to three inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch possible. * WHERE...Lowlands of western Skagit County, including Cypress Island, Guemes Island, Anacortes, Mount Vernon, and La Conner. * WHEN...From this evening through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This is will be a complex mix of winter precipitation with potentially significant impacts.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
